analyzed: snying po'i phyag rgya bstan te lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa bskor zhing /

original: zhes brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should stabilize the pride by saying:🔽OṂ Yoga is pure, all dharmas are pure in yoga, I am pure in yoga.

translated: Then, in order to confer the empowerment, one should imagine that light rays shine from the letter HŪṂ at the heart, and the sugatas of the five families arrive in the sky.

analyzed: de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod de / byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //

translated: of Ākāśavajra.

original: rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba //
translated: The great vajra confers empowerment.

original: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa'i //

translated: The three realms pay homage to him.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //

translated: The secret of the three secrets of all buddhas

original: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
analyzed: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
translated: arises from the place and is given.

original: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
analyzed: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
translated: Just as soon as he was born,

original: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
translated: just as all tathāgatas were bathed,

original: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
analyzed: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
translated: with the pure divine water

original: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
translated: I also bathe him.

original: zhes pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: With that, one should confer empowerment.

analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi dbul mi bskyod pa sa gnon gyis phyag can sku mdog sngon po rdo rje skyil krung @204b can bsam mo //

analyzed: de nas ci nus su bsgom mo //
translated: Then, meditate on them as much as one can.

analyzed: de las skyon bzlas pa bya'o // aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: From that, one should do the mantra recitation.🔽oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru ka hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram sv'a h'a /
translated: ḍākinī jālā samavaraṃ svāhā

analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha huṃ phaṭ

analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki ni ya / badzra warnna n'i ye hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ sarva buddha dakiniye🔽vajra varṇanīye huṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra bee ro tsan'i ye hum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsan'i ye hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra vairocanīye huṃ phaṭ

original: aom d'i ki n'i ye hum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom d'i ki n'i ye hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ dikiniye huṃ phaṭ

analyzed: aom l'a ma ye hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ lamayi huṃ phaṭ

analyzed: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍarohī huṃ phaṭ

original: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /🔽aom k'a kla sye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat / aom k'a kla sye h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ rūpiṇīye huṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ kākaśye huṃ phaṭ

analyzed: aom au lu k'a sye h'u h'um phat / aom sva n'a sye h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ ulukaśye huṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ svānāśye huṃ phaṭ

original: aom s'u kar'a sye h'u h'um phat /
analyzed: aom s'u kar'a sye h'u h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ sūkarāśye huṃ phaṭ

original: aom ya ma damsht'i n'i ye h'u h'um phat /🔽aom ya ma du t'i ye h'u h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ya ma damsht'i n'i ye h'u h'um phat / aom ya ma du t'i ye h'u h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ yamadamṣṭrīṇi huṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ yamaduṭīṇi huṃ phaṭ

analyzed: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye h'u h'um phat /

analyzed: de nas ldang bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor rang gi thugs kar bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Then, if one wishes to rise, one should gather the maṇḍala into one’s heart.

original: phyag dang zhal thams cad rtsa ba'i zhal la bsdu /
analyzed: phyag dang zhal thams cad rtsa ba'i zhal la bsdu /
translated: All the faces and hands are gathered into the principal face.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas rdo rje /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas rdo rje /
translated: [One becomes] one-faced and two-handed, with a vajra in the right hand🔽and a bell in the left hand.

original: g-yon dril bu 'dzin pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: g-yon dril bu 'dzin pa bsgom mo //
translated: He holds a bell in his left hand.

original: de ltar thun bzhir bsam mo //
analyzed: de ltar thun bzhir bsam mo //
translated: One should meditate in this way in four sessions.

original: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: One should meditate and recite.

original: de ltar thun bzhir bsgoms la thun tha ma la ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi snying gar sdus la nyal lo //
analyzed: de ltar thun bzhir bsgoms la thun tha ma la ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi snying gar sdus la nyal lo //
translated: One should meditate in this way in four sessions. In the last session, one should gather the maṇḍala of the jñānasattva into one's heart and go to sleep.

original: nang bar ni sdar bshad pa thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: nang bar ni sdar bshad pa thams cad bya'o //
translated: In the morning, one should do all the previously explained practices.🔽The sādhana of the thirteen deities is complete.
